algorithm_technique: Track current positive and negative product lengths, resetting at zeros.
problem_summary_simple: Find the longest subarray with a positive product of all its elements.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through the array, maintaining counts of negative numbers and the positions of the last zero and first negative number.
key_insights: Zeros act as separators, breaking the array into independent subproblems.
The sign of the product depends on the count of negative numbers.
A subarray has a positive product if it contains an even number of negative numbers and no zeros.
